product_name: Oakley Radar Edge Interchangeable Sunglasses - Breast Cancer Awareness Edition - Women's
long_description: The women's Oakley Radar Edge Breast Cancer Awareness Edition Interchangeable Sunglasses benefit your eyes-and young women diagnosed with breast cancer. With every Breast Cancer Awareness special edition purchase, Oakley will contribute $20 to a non-profit dedicated to young women diagnosed with breast cancer. Radar Edge sunglasses optimize peripheral vision and side coverage. Polycarbonate lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays and resist impact damage. Durable nylon frame offers all-day comfort. Earsocks and nosepads increase their grip in sweaty conditions. Oakley Radar Edge Breast Cancer Awareness Edition Interchangeable Sunglasses come with a Soft Vault case. Interchangeable lenses not included.
short_description: The women's Oakley Radar Edge Breast Cancer Awareness Edition Interchangeable Sunglasses benefit your eyes-and young women diagnosed with breast cancer.
